channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-10780] HFilePrettyPrinter#processFile should return immediately if file does not exist
item.description:
HFilePrettyPrinter#processFile should return immediately if file does not exists same like HLogPrettyPrinter#run


    if (!fs.exists(file)) {

      System.err.println("ERROR, file doesnt exist: " + file);

    }
item.summary: HFilePrettyPrinter#processFile should return immediately if file does not exist

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: A simple patch for this issue. Please review

Should we exit with non zero exit code on any IOE ? Currently on any IOE we just log and command exit code is 0.


      try {

        processFile(fileName);

      } catch (IOException ex) {

        LOG.error("Error reading " + fileName, ex);

      }

@Ashish:
Mind attaching an up-to-date patch ?

This message is automatically generated.

Currently we have the following when checking option 'w':


        System.err.println("Invalid row is specified.");

        System.exit(-1);

You can use a different negative value.

Thanks Ted for looking into it.
Updated the patch as per your suggestion.
Please review.
